name: DUPMED_DISMISS_HH_INFO
description: This table stores data related to duplicate medications on the Home Health Remote Client.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: DUPMED_DISMISS_EMP_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who dismissed the duplicate medication warning that the Remote Client showed after the medication was added.

columns.name: DUPMED_DISMISS_EMP_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: DUPMED_DISMISS_CSN
columns.description: This item stores the patient contact serial number (CSN) associated with the update which dismissed the duplicate warning for this order on the Remote Client.

columns.name: DUPMED_DISMISS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant when the Remote Client was synchronized after the duplicate warning for this order was dismissed.
